sqlMap.select: select * from (select * from t_member a, t_band_board_$band_id$ b where a.id = b.band_board_writer) order by band_board_reg desc
select * from (select * from t_band where band_range = 1 order by band_reg desc) where rownum <= 6
select name, path from t_member where id = (select band_board_writer from t_band_board_$band_id$)
sqlMap.update: update t_band set band_img = #band_img# where band_id = #band_id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_band(band_id, band_name, band_leader, band_intro, band_range, band_reg) values(t_band_seq.NEXTVAL, #band_name#, #band_leader#, #band_intro#, #band_range#, sysdate)

create table t_band_board_$band_id$(band_board_num number primary key, band_board_notice number default 0, band_board_writer varchar2(100), band_board_img varchar2(1000), band_board_content varchar2(2000), band_board_readcount number default 0, band_board_reg date default sysdate)

create table t_band_board_comment_$band_id$(band_board_comment_bno number, band_board_comment_cno number, band_board_comment_writer varchar2(100), band_board_comment_comment varchar2(500), band_board_comment_reg date default sysdate)

create table t_band_member_$band_id$(band_member_no number, band_member_id varchar2(100), band_member_name varchar2(300), band_member_img varchar2(300), band_member_level number, band_member_reg date default sysdate)
create table t_band_board_imgs_$band_id$(band_board_num number, band_board_writer varchar2(100), band_board_img varchar2(200), band_board_img_reg date default sysdate)
